nodes.text: Jeridel was an individual who lived on Corellia during the Galactic Civil War. Jeridel and her brother Jenson both worked in an illegal lab on Corellia, a lab specialized in bio-engineering creatures through dangerous genetic experiments. Circa 1 ABY, Jenson was promoted as lead creature handler. However, Jeridel's brother failed to return back after three days. When a spacer working for Lieutenant Joth of the Corellian Security Force arrived to investigate the lab, Jeridel hired the spacer to search the laboratory where Jenson worked, to find out what had happened to him. The spacer later returned and informed Jeridel that the brother had been killed by the facility's acklay. Jeridel paid the individual 2,500 credits for discovering this information.

Jeridel was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Jeridel was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
Jeridel's species and gender were randomized after each server reset. Species Jeridel could appear as included, but were not necessarily limited to, Aqualish, Humans, Mon Calamari, and Twi'leks.
